EmailTemplate.name: 18-GEPS TO-Partner-Email-Operational-T001OY.21505.Email - Open Catalog
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia Global Partner Program – Open Catalog schedule
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Global Partner Program Partners,
Nokia has now published the Open Catalog schedule for Instructor Led Training (ILT) for Q1 and Q2. Course catalogs can be found in the Partner Learning Store <[[http://learningstore.nokia.com/partner/#Home]]> and the Partner Portal <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/06841000007cU3t]]>. Please make sure to log into the Partner Portal in order to access the document.
As a reminder, you must register to confirm your planned attendance one month prior to course start dates.
To ensure that you receive your partner discounts for your ILT course, please work with your regional NokiaEDU learning lead:
APAC: Moh Jajurie <[[mailto:moh.jajurie@nokia.com]]> Americas: Adrian Marina <[[mailto:adrian.marina@nokia.com]]> EMEA: Adrian Marina <[[mailto:adrian.marina@nokia.com]]>
Nokia Global Partner Program Connect with us ©{{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia | Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
